titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament declaring the causes wherefore after the refusall of many remonstrances, declaration and treaties, had and sent by the kingdome of Scotland, unto His Maiesty for the more speedy ending
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament declaring the causes wherefore after the refusall of many remonstrances, declaration and treaties, had and sent by the kingdome of Scotland, unto His Maiesty for the more speedy ending
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

notesStmt.note: The "foregoing ordinance" mentioned on the t.p. is An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, for the raising of 66666 l. 13 s. 4 d. by way of loane but is lacking on film.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
